[bq="Too_Offensive"]"We are probably going to see mammoths in our lifetime":geekologie.com/2015/03/skip-this-go-straight-to-dinos-scientist.php

Science. [/bq]
Sorry to burst everyone's bubble thinking we're going to see dinosaurs too; it's literally physically impossible to bring back dinosaurs cause dna actually has a half life in that dinosaurs existed so long ago that *ALL* of the dna is gone.
